1.content:
Its Pick An Era Time!

Feel free to make or change History!

Or, if you don't see the time you would absolutely love to be in. Add it in choice 5! Make sure to leave a "More choices" option though!
1.title: Choose your Time!

11.content:
Odette Marche

Beautiful French Aristocrat by day, However, behind her stately facade lies a smart, patriotic Frenchwomen. So patriotic in fact, she has sacrificed her pride and snuggled up to SS Colonel, Oberst Hans Lander, in order to gain information that could benefit the resistance. Her pride was not the only thing she sacrificed though. She is currently 6 months pregnant with the Oberst's child.

Grace Bloomingdale

British Nurse. Was impregnated by an American GI in the weeks following the D-Day landings. However, still remains in France as a nurse. Helping the wounded brought back from the front.

Maria Gruber

Female SS Member. Late in the war volunteers for a Nazi experiment for an Accelerated Growth Pregnancy Serum to solve the Germans troop shortages.

Masha Dubrov

Soviet Sniper. Although Pregnant, is made to fight in the battle of Stalingrad due to a shortage of troops. Takes many lives for the Motherland while preparing to give it one.
11.title: WW2

choices: The carrier can't give birth but her belly/womb can grow without limit.
The babies multiplied themselves but the carrier belly can grow without limit.
113.content:
Maria was in the laboratory, ready for the injection.
"I'm ready doctor" said Maria. Maria was impregnated by an unknow "Arien" who was selectioned to give his sperm to Maria.
Maria also was selectioned among the volonter to carry the first rapid grew super soldier.
The doctor injected the product to accelerate the grow of her children to produce soldier rapidely but there were side effect.
Due to the iminent defeat the Nazi didn't take time to get ride of them or even know what they were.
The side effect were :
113.title: Maria Gruber

choices: Shotgun Sandy. The Scourge of the East Side
Officer Shannon O'Hara. Heading into Trouble!
Dolores Minsk. The Careless Dancing Girl.
Cynthia Swallows. Who Simply Struggles To Get By.
12.content:
Pregnant gangster Moll (Shotgun Sandy) runs the east side counterfitting racket. What could possibly go wrong?

Police Officer (Shannon O'Hara) is on her last day before maternity leave. Suddenly the Radio sparks into action! Its a bank robbery! All Units Respond!

Speakeasy dancing girl (Dolores Minsk) finds herself having the child of some scrub she made a quick buck out of. How will she support her child? She certainly can't dance anymore. Perhaps some of the local street gangs can help?

Just an ordinary housewife (Cynthia Swallows) who is struggling to get by. Maybe she could sell her services to a Pharmaceutics company? She has heard a local place is asking for testers for a prototype IVF Treatment. Maybe they will pay well?
12.title: Prohibition

choices: Norma Fields. The Peasant Of The Prince.
Dame Lysander of Kent. The Restricted Knight.
Are the Rumours of Witchcraft true?
Her Royal Highness Queen Katherine II.
13.content:
Serving girl (Norma Field) finds herself pregnant after a night with the prince. However, he does not what her to have it or for anyone to know! Whatever shall she do?

Female Knight (Dame Lysander of Kent) tries to come to terms with the loss of her athleticism and strength while having a baby.

Several women become "suddenly" pregnant. Rumours of witchcraft abound! But are they true?

Queen (Katherine II) finds herself having a child, but with an attack on the Kingdom imminent, will she live to see its birth?
13.title: Middle Ages

choices: Wait and see for anything suspicious
133.content:
The small village of Knotts was of little note to most of the surrounding area; Knotts was a simple farming and mining village that supplied towns and fellow villages within the county. At least, up until the past few months.

Many women, young and old, were pregnant and successfully delivering their children. At first, it seemed like a divine blessing, having so many new families who would pass on their parents' legacies. Later down the line however, the numbers of new mothers were growing more and more, with the chances of twins and triplets becoming more frequent. Many believed it still the work of God, but the vast majority were calling witchcraft and wizardry. It was time someone investigated.

Dorothy Whitaker, 24, mother of 1 son, decided to take matters into her own hands. As one of the earliest cases of the magical pregnancy gift, she went to ask around the locals about what they think or have heard.
133.title: Are the Rumours of Witchcraft true?

choices: Aid the Revival of the Goverment
Mary Kingston and the Mystery Vial?
Follow the Story Natalie Hopkins. Eternally Pregnant.
14.content:
Bandit Leader (Quadbike) captures a scavenger and decides his/her fate. Her name comes from the method she uses to keep her bandit pack loyal, and "may" have contributed to her pregnant state.

Small Remnants of the Pre-War Government who took shelter from the initial blasts decide how best to repopulate the country, at the end of a loaded gun if necessary.

Scrapper (Mary Kingston) finds an un-smashed vial of liquid in the ruins of a fertility clinic. What to do next?

Untouchable (Natalie Hopkins) was pregnant when the bombs dropped. She survived, but the resulting fallout mutated her DNA, extending not only her lifetime, but also the length of her pregnancy.
14.title: After Nuclear Apocalypse

choices: Go out and bring in survivors for the experiments.
Go out with the equipment in order to trial the technology.
No. Its too dangerous. The Door stays closed.
142.content:
A small man stood flailing at the head of the large mahogany table, his dark suit seeming to crumple more and more with every movement, like it was made for someone two sizes bigger.The man talked big though, his deep southern voice booming around the lifeless steel walls. In a way, the reverberations almost seemed to be mocking him, repeating his words in a shrill tone like an annoying child. His predictions however, were far from childish.

"We have to do something now! The population within this bunker is dwindling, less than ten percent capacity! Who knows what that drops to outside! If we don't do anything to increase the population. We will lose all human presence on the eastern seaboard!"

He paused, his face red. He seemed to be trying to catch his breath, as if those words had been a long flight of stairs. He tugged at his collar, obviously uncomfortable. It was dreadfully hot, even despite all the ventilation fans that whirred noisily overhead. Then, after a short moment he spoke again. Much more calmly this time, sinking back into his chair as he did. "When we locked ourselves inside this damn cage. We promised the people we left outside we would resolve the rising tensions between us and Russia. We failed at that. When the bombs fell, we promised ourselves we would provide aid and shelter to the survivors of the blasts. We failed to do that too. And now, we are failing at the oaths we took when we came into our offices. To protect the people, to protect America! But tell me.... Who is there left to protect? Where is the mighty United States of America? I'll tell you where. The United States of America is now confined to a 20,000 sq ft shelter approximately 3 miles underground! We are failures... every one of us...." With that, he sunk his head into his hands.

Then, from the back of the room came another voice. Much more authoritative, yet still uniquely warm. "Ladies, Gentlemen. What the senator has said is true. We have failed our people. And we have failed our nation. But that does not mean we can not try to fix what we got oh so wrong. I believe that, working together. We can rebuild what has been destroyed. We can rediscover what has been lost. And we can be reborn from the ashes of the old world."

The owner of the voice stood then, highlighting his stature. Tall and broad. Yet he held himself even taller.

"And, to that end. I would like to introduce you all to Doctor Elizabeth Pace. Dr Pace was brought into the bunker as the Administrations expert adviser on reproductive medicine. I believe you will all be interested in her work on "Project Phoenix".

Just then, from the back of the room came a small figure. Her most professional feature was her lab coat, which she wore undone. Everything else seemed to be styled for comfort. Such as the tee, hoodie and jeans combination she wore underneath.On her feet were a pair of old red converse that looked as if they were the only pair she wore. Her brunette hair too, looked to be given minimal attention, with only the loosest tresses added to keep it orderly. When she spoke however, it was clear that her appearance belied her intelligence, which sparkled from behind her deep brown eyes.

"Thank you Mr President. Now then, as you will already be aware my name is Dr Pace and i am the lead researcher on "Project Phoenix". I suppose you are all wondering what exactly Project Phoenix is? Well, the short answer is exactly what it says on the tin. We aim to make humanity rise from its ashs, literally. For the last three years me and my team have been working on a way to extract and condense human DNA from ashes caused by the blasts into viable reproductive carriers. We believe this approach will allow us to bypass the sterilizing effect the radiation has had on all of our bodies and allow us to carry children again. We have already used this approach in laboratory tests between primates and it seems to work. However, as of yet we have been unable to do so to humans simply as we do not yet know the risks that may arise and we cannot afford to lose any more bunker personnel."

The group gathered around the table sat in thought for a minute, each pondering the possible implications of bringing humanity back from the brink. Then, from among the group came a voice, distinctly Californian and female.

"So what do you believe should be our next moves Dr Pace"

Dr Pace swallowed hard, she knew the impact her next words would have, so she had to chose them carefully.

"I believe, that to ensure the survival of our country, we must open the bunker and send out a research party to bring back human subjects. Either that, or we take the technology outside the bunker and test it there"

At that, the quietly thoughtful group exploded in cries of disbelief and derision.

"Open the Bunker Door! Are you mad!", "You cannot seriously be considering exposing this shelter to the outside!", "Are you Nutso! No way am i agreeing to this!", "We're safer with the door closed!"

Just then, the President again stood up, a thoughtful look in his eyes. Everybody was silenced waiting for his verdict.
142.title: The State of America

144.content:
Natalie Hopkins was aged 28 when the nuclear war begun, bombs struck every city in the major country in the world.Natalie was in her 8th month of pregnancy with quadruplets and the radioactive radiation mutated her DNA and allowed her to live for as long as the radiation is present.Not only that she is now forever pregnant it seems.Instead of nine months her body has been transformed to be able to be more stretchy and can contain the babies for up to 2 years now.Natalie doesn't work as she was on maternity leave and now with the nuclear bombs gone and only dead and radiation around her, she has to survive on her own.The children she gives birth to are also different in their growth as they are more stronger and grow faster.

It is the early days of the fallout of the bombs and a heavily pregnant Natalie is trying to survive of scavenging.In her current state it is very difficult for her to move, so far she has seen no survivors near her area.Either they died or they hid with the government.Natalie is wearing tattered scrap of clothes, her breasts are only partially obscured and her belly is much exposed .Currently she only has a kitchen knife and 15 days worth of food and water.She has heard that there is another similar pregnant survivor in a nursery in the neighborhood.She could try to make friends with her.She could either try going to the nearby clinic that has an ultrasound machine that might be working or she could try scavenging around the nearby houses.

What shall Natalie do? Do keep in mind she is carrying 4 babies in her and is eight months along currently.
144.title: The eternally pregnant...

15.content:
NEW TIME:

American Civil War

Women from all sorts of backgrounds and beliefs can carry a baby. How will this affect them when the war strikes?
15.title: You Decide!

151.content:
Polly Oliver

A short, brown-haired young woman from Connecticut who masquerades as a man to join the Union army. She has no feminine parts to speak of, making her the perfect male. Little did she know, she had gotten knocked up just a few weeks prior! As her belly, hips, and breasts grows ever larger, her superiors are bound to notice something, and she's afraid of what they will do...

How will she fight as a man if she's beginning to look like a woman?

Belle South

A blond-haired 20-something woman born and raised in South Carolina. The perfect example of a Southern lady. As the daughter of one of the most of profitable plantation farmers, she was brought up to be charming, beautiful, and classy. Unfortunately, however, at her coming-of-age ball, she let her desires take hold, and got knocked up by one of her suitors, James Marlborough. Her parents are hardcore Christian, and would never let her have a child before marriage. Will James come back from war to help her raise the child? Or is he long gone?
151.title: American Civil War

152.content:
NEW TIME:
Far Future

Earth has been destroyed by a plethora of viruses and infectious organisms. Those who were deemed 'clean' were sent to space on Dreadnought-class ships that would hold hundreds of thousands of people...expect for a pair of girls who were inexplicably given their own ship.

Little did they know they'd be a part of the "Repopulation Program"...
152.title: Another time?

info.brief_description: Decide the events of time itself! You choose the path.
info.description:
The year is.....well, whatever you choose it to be!

Travel through the ages and decide the fate of these women. You hold the power of decision in your hands!

(If there is an age you wish to add feel free. But make sure to add characters and not just the era)

Rules

No M-Preg
No Scat
Always keep the story going. Or if you are going to end it. Add an options to keep it going.
Slight WG is acceptable as long as it is Pregnancy weight. Not planetary.

Submissions, Reviews and Ideas Appreciated!

Your Sincerly

Pregstories
